After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Percentage of technicians who complete required training programs, reflecting the effectiveness of training initiatives.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: (Number of Technicians Completing Training / Total Number of Technicians) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Measure of the improvement in techniciansâ€™ skills and knowledge following training programs, assessed through performance evaluations and testing.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: (Post-Training Skill Level - Pre-Training Skill Level) / Pre-Training Skill Level * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Percentage of technicians who achieve certifications after completing required training programs, reflecting the effectiveness of training efforts.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: (Number of Technicians Attaining Certification / Total Number of Technicians) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from technician training programs compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of training benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Training / Total Cost of Training) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the skills, knowledge, and professionalism of technicians, typically obtained through post-service surveys.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Technician Expertise

After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Percentage of technicians leaving the company within a specified period, indicating workforce stability and satisfaction.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: (Number of Technicians Leaving / Total Number of Technicians) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each hour of technician training, including instructor fees, materials, and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: Total Cost of Training / Total Training Hours

After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.EXPLANATION: Degree to which technician training programs adhere to established standards and requirements, measured through audits and evaluations.
After Sales+Service Management+Technicia.FORMULA: (Number of Training Compliant Instances / Total Number of Training Instances) * 100
